description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) changed domain federation trust settings using Azure AD administrative permissions to configure the domain to accept authorization tokens signed by their own SAML signing certificate.(Citation: Microsoft 365 Defender Solorigate)(Citation: Secureworks IRON RITUAL Profile)

external_references.description: Microsoft 365 Defender Team. (2020, December 28). Using Microsoft 365 Defender to protect against Solorigate. Retrieved January 7, 2021.
Secureworks CTU. (n.d.). IRON RITUAL. Retrieved February 24, 2022.
